name: Remove or Skip cart page for WooCommerce
author: Sikander Maan

sections.description:
Remove or Skip cart page for WooCommerce is a plugin that allows you to bypass the WooCommrce cart page, redirecting your customers directly to checkout page.

Remove or Skip cart page for WooCommerce is ideal when you need to force your customers to buy only one or multipule products at a time from your WooCommerce catalog, but additionally, by modifying the standard WooCommerce shopping behavior, it greatly simplifies WooCommerce process of finalizing orders, increasing your users conversions and increasing your profits.

Features

Disable cart page for WooCommerce plugin provide you a lot of extra features, such as:
* Simplified purchase
* Functions control
* Multilanguage
* Enable/Disable settings

Hooks & Filters

  • Change redirect page when cart is empty: apply_filters( ‘sorcart_redirect’, string $permalink )
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire skip-or-remove-cart-page-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to settings tab, under WooCommerce settings page, and enable the plugin functionality.
sections.faq:
What happens if someone reaches the cart page?

Plugin redirect customers to checkout permanently

What happens if a customer has added a product to the shopping cart before a new product adding?

Plugin take care to empty cart before another product is added

Can i activate multipule product purchase?

Yes you have setting for that. You can enable / disable it.

Can i change the add to cart button text?

Yes, you have setting for that also.

short_description: Remove or Skip cart page. You have option for purchase one or more products from plugin.
